attributes.action: ensure that motorists shouldn't have to wait for hours on end when a motorway is closed due to an incident
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently I have read of motorists sitting for hours waiting on the carriageway of amotorway after it has ben closed due to an unforseen incident. When this occurs a procedure should be put into operation as fast as possible to allow traffic to turn round in a controlled manner and leave the motorway shepherded by police controlled convoys. 
Currently there are families, children, invalids, businessmen and others who are expected to sit for 4  or 5 hours maybe in considerable distress or discomfort for the motorway to reopen. This is unacceptable and can easily be avoided. There should be a maximum delay set as a target for clearing the motorways under such circumstances.
